string-array.name: content
string-array.item:
Dark Green Colored Plant, Firm Leaves, Brightly colored 
 flowers, Well shaped, good-colored, nutritious grains, pods or fruits. 
 TIPS: 
 Fertilize with the right and a balanced nutrient supply.
